main.title: Telegram bots for activism made easy
main.subtitle: Open-source no-code platform empowers you to create and operate professional Telegram bots

feedback.title: Safe and convenient feedback
feedback.subtitle: Let people reach you and talk to them through the bot without compromising anyone’s security

form.title: Data collection and management
form.subtitle: Collect applications, submissions and other kinds of forms without ever leaving Telegram

kb.title: Interactive knowledge base
kb.subtitle: Turn a boring FAQ into an interactive knowledge base, easily accessible and navigable through your bot

visual.title: Visual interface
visual.subtitle: No coding skills required – create bots in a visual environment

multilang.title: Multilanguage bots
multilang.subtitle: Bots are easily localizable – talk to users in their own language

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Use examples to get familiar with the platform

customization.title: Customization
customization.subtitle: In addition to the common functionality, you can request custom modules

stats.title: Statistics
stats.subtitle: Track statistics and export available data

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Integrate bots in your workflow: export data to Airtable, Google Sheets and more

open_source.subtitle: Easily self-host for maximum security and transparency

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Bots are private-by-default, protecting identities of both users and your team members
